Description.Text: Schweizerhof Pontresina is a modern 3-star hotel offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Pontresina. Highlights include modern spa facilities and onsite dining. The hotel is beautifully situated in the spa town of Pontresina. Its prime position enables easy access to an abundance of walking, hiking and mountain biking trails, as well as plenty of luxurious spas. The deluxe skiing resort town of St Moritz is within driving distance and boasts ample skiing and outdoor sports opportunities, in addition to a luxurious range of shops and restaurants. Pontresina train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to St Moritz and other popular destinations in the east of Switzerland. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building with a tan facade. Facilities include a Jacuzzi, sauna and a small lounge next to reception. Massages are available upon request. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Au premier restaurant offers Swiss cuisine. Alternatively, there is a second restaurant which has an Italian menu. Refreshing beverages are available from the bar, where, during winter guests can enjoy live piano music. Standard rooms are spacious and decorated in a contemporary style with neutral tones or in a mountain cabin style with dark wood flooring, wood panelling and warm caramel tones. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
